summary: "Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2" is a 2017 superhero movie about a space team helping Peter Quill discover his parents. It's the sequel to the 2014 "Guardians of the Galaxy" and part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe. James Gunn directed and wrote the film, which stars Chris Pratt, Zoe Salda√±a, and others. The Guardians travel the cosmos, fighting and joking while Peter learns about his dad, Ego, played by Kurt Russell. The movie made lots of money and got good reviews for its fun, action, and music. A third film followed in 2023.
title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
